PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04482018-04-20,  ,  PCH,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation ** purchase and sale **
PrecisOrder approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION, as vendor, enter into an agreement of purchase and sale with Anthem Westmount Developments Limited Partnership, as purchaser, to dispose of real property located at 1724 Westmount Boulevard North West, in Calgary, Alberta, for a total consideration in excess of $4,000,000.
AttachmentsAttachment
